recipe.title: Blueberry Banana Shake
instructions: In a blender, blend the banana, the blueberries, the honey, and the yogurt until the mixture is smooth and chill the mixture for 1 hour if desired. Pour the mixture into chilled glasses. (Frozen blueberries result in slightly thicker shakes.)
